resources.string: Data provider has returned an error.
Data provider has returned an empty list of vehicles.
Zoom in to see all of the vehicles.

After zooming the map out, it can happen that many vehicles should be visible. Unfortunately for some devices it is too much and in order to avoid issues I had to introduce the limit of currently visible vehicles. If auto zooming in is enabled, the map will be zooming in so that the limit is not reached and all the vehicles in the area are displayed.
You can choose a localisation, which will be displayed after running the application.
When this option is enabled, after clicking the vehicle marker the info window will show up with brigade details.
If you are done with the ads, you can buy the pro version - \"Where\'s that tram? Pro\".\nThe only difference between apps is that the free one contains the ads, whereas the paid one doesn\'t.

You can chooose lines that you are observing the most often. It will allow you to turn on the favorites view. It will make the map easier to read. You can turn on the favorites view by clicking the star icon on the map view.
Author has no responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, as well as data provider\'s servers availability.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by Miasto Stołeczne Warszawa via http://api.um.warszawa.pl
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by Zarzad Infrastruktury Komunalnej i Transportu w Krakowie.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by MPK Wrocław.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by MPK Łódź.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by Zarząd Dróg i Transportu Miejskiego w Szczecinie.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by MPK Bielsko-Biała.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by Miejski Zakład Komunikacji w Zielonej Górze.
Data about the vehicles position are delivered by Zarząd Transportu Metropolitalnego.
It\'s the first launch, therefore we need to configure it!
First of all, you have to decide if you want to allow the app to know about your location. If you agree, you will be able to easily move the map to your current location.
You have to choose a city you want to observe. You can change it later in the settings.
Click a line to add or remove it from the favorites.
